com.mesosphere.sdk.offer

Interface OfferRecommendation

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    UninstallRecommendation
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CreateOfferRecommendation, DestroyOfferRecommendation, LaunchOfferRecommendation, ReserveOfferRecommendation, StoreTaskInfoRecommendation, UnreserveOfferRecommendation

    public interface OfferRecommendation
    This interface encapsulates both a recommended Mesos Operation to be performed and an Offer on which the Operation should be performed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Protos.SlaveID getAgentId()
      Returns the ID of the agent machine that the original Offer belonged to.
      Protos.OfferID getOfferId()
      Returns the ID of the original Offer that had been evaluated when generating the recommendation.
      java.util.Optional<Protos.Offer.Operation> getOperation()
      Returns an operation which should be sent to Mesos in response to the offer (as returned by #getOffer()), or an empty Optional if nothing should be sent to Mesos.

    • Method Detail

      • getOperation

        java.util.Optional<Protos.Offer.Operation> getOperation()
        Returns an operation which should be sent to Mesos in response to the offer (as returned by #getOffer()), or an empty Optional if nothing should be sent to Mesos. The latter case can be useful for any additional bookkeeping work to be performed following a successful evaluation.

      • getOfferId

        Protos.OfferID getOfferId()
        Returns the ID of the original Offer that had been evaluated when generating the recommendation.

      • getAgentId

        Protos.SlaveID getAgentId()
        Returns the ID of the agent machine that the original Offer belonged to.
